Ian Roberts (a mụrụ na 30 Nọvemba 1951) bụ onye South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-ede egwuregwu na onye na-agụ egwu
Onye na-asụ Bekee, ọ na-asukwa Afrikaans na Xhosa nke ọma.
A mụrụ Roberts na Fort Beaufort na Eastern Cape Province ma o too n'ugbo citrus nke nna ya dị nso n'obodo ahụ
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ mba ya na ndị agha South Africa, nke ọ gụsịrị n'afọ 1971.

Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ dị iche iche na ọmụmụ ihe na foto na Port Elizabeth Technical College site n'afọ 1973 ruo 1975, Roberts debanyere aha na Mahadum Rhodes n'afọ 1976 maka nzere Bachelor of Arts na-agụnye Speech, Drama na Social Anthropology.

Roberts ghọrọ ihe ngosi South Africa mgbe ọ na-eme ihe ngosi nke Boet na usoro mgbasa ozi telivishọn ogologo oge maka mmanụ ụgbọala Castrol.: 4 A na-egosikwa ihe ngosi a (ya na ndị ọzọ Swaer na Moegoe) na usoro ihe ọchị nke M-Net Kalahari Oasis yana na Radio Kalahari Orkes band ya.: 4
Na ihe nkiri South Africa nke nwetara Oscar, Tsotsi: 4 Roberts rụrụ ọrụ nke onyeisi ndị uwe ojii.
Ọ lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri South Africa bụ Michelle Botes, mana di na nwunye ahụ gbara alụkwaghịm n'afọ 1999

Na mgbakwunye na nke dị n'elu, Roberts arụwo ọrụ dị mkpa na usoro telivishọn asụsụ Afrikaans dịka Sloet Steenkamp na Arende ("Eagles") na Jack Degenaar na Arsenaal ("Arsenal"), yana ọrụ nkwado na Kwelaman (1986)
O deela ọtụtụ edemede, dịka Honeytown 1 na egwu Palang van Dwaal ("Palang si Dwaal").
